normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Diwali Lights Early!

unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Diwali Lights Early!**
normalised: Good news for all you eco-warriors out there! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is seriously boosting solar rooftop subsidies, and it's like getting a Diwali gift a bit early!

unnormalised: Good news for all you eco-warriors out there! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is seriously boosting solar rooftop subsidies, and it's like getting a Diwali gift a bit early!
normalised: Folks in cities like Chennai, Bangalore, and even smaller towns like Madurai are lining up to take advantage of the scheme. Imagine powering your entire home with sunshine and saving a ton on those electricity bills!

unnormalised: Folks in cities like Chennai, Bangalore, and even smaller towns like Madurai are lining up to take advantage of the scheme. Imagine powering your entire home with sunshine and saving a ton on those electricity bills!
normalised: The subsidy covers a significant chunk of the installation cost, potentially saving you rupee fifty thousand on a three kilowatt system. Plus, banks are offering easy loans to sweeten the deal even further.

unnormalised: The subsidy covers a significant chunk of the installation cost, potentially saving you Rs. 50,000 on a 3kW system. Plus, banks are offering easy loans to sweeten the deal even further.
normalised: Think about it – using clean energy while enjoying a plate of hot biryani, guilt-free! Local installers like Surya Power Solutions are seeing a huge surge in demand.

unnormalised: Think about it – using clean energy while enjoying a plate of hot biryani, guilt-free! Local installers like Surya Power Solutions are seeing a huge surge in demand.
normalised: Officials say this push could help India reach its ambitious renewable energy targets faster than expected.

unnormalised: Officials say this push could help India reach its ambitious renewable energy targets faster than expected.
normalised: Even your neighbor, Sharmaji, is considering switching! Get on board and let's make India shine brighter, one solar panel at a time. More details are available on m n r e dot gov dot in. Don't delay - like a good plate of Onam Sadhya, these subsidies won't last forever!

unnormalised: Even your neighbor, Sharmaji, is considering switching! Get on board and let's make India shine brighter, one solar panel at a time. More details are available on mnre.gov.in. Don't delay - like a good plate of Onam Sadhya, these subsidies won't last forever!
